featured.text: Although Russia does not occupy first place when it comes to alcohol consumption per capita, it is still close to the top.

definition.zh_def: 每人，通常用於統計或經濟學中，表示每個人或每個居民的數量。
definition.en_def: A term used to refer to each individual person, often used in statistics or economics to indicate per person or per capita.
definition.example: The income per capita in the country has increased over the last decade.
